BodyName: Committee on Cultural Affairs, Libraries and International Intergroup Relations

Items.Title: Resolution designating October as Youth Empowerment Month annually in the City of New York to recognize, appreciate, and celebrate the successes of young people and their contributions to school and community life.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Designating October as Youth Empowerment Month annually in the City of New York to recognize, appreciate, and celebrate the successes of young people and their contributions to school and community life.

Items.Title: Resolution designating October 10 annually as Casey Benjamin Day in the City of New York and celebrating the genius of his music and his unique contributions to a variety of music genres.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Designating October 10 annually as Casey Benjamin Day in the City of New York and celebrating the genius of his music and his unique contributions to a variety of music genres.

Items.Title: Resolution declaring October as Jamaican Heritage Month in New York City.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Declaring October as Jamaican Heritage Month in New York City.

Items.Title: Resolution celebrating the New York Liberty’s winning of the 2024 Women’s National Basketball Association championship and declaring October 20 as New York Liberty Day annually in the City of New York.

Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Celebrating the New York Liberty’s winning of the 2024 Women’s National Basketball Association championship and declaring October 20 as New York Liberty Day annually in the City of New York.

Items.Title: Resolution celebrating the New York Liberty’s winning of the 2024 Women’s National Basketball Association championship and declaring October 20 as New York Liberty Day annually in the City of New York.
